entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: COVID-19: Global updates
entity.description: The latest news and analysis on the coronavirus pandemic from around the world.

text: "If I go outside and walk for 30 minutes it will put me down for two days," says Chelsea Alionar, who began experiencing Covid-19 symptoms in March. "Leaving the house is not an option." https://t.co/nvWSkdAOUQ
